title: Bought by the Biker: Dragon Kings MC
description: I was never supposed to return to the Dragon Kings MC.But I’ll do anything to find my brother.After all, family comes first. Always.Everything changes the instant Mila shows up with her beautiful curves and seductive eyes.When she tells me she’s looking for her niece, I start to think there could be a connection.I’ll help her bring that little girl home. And my brother Calix.With only four days to find them, time is working against us.Four days with me and Mila will never want to leave.Only, I didn’t expect to fall in love during the search of our lives.Everything is at stake, but all I can focus on is her.Bought by the Biker is a complete standalone motorcycle romance. It has an HEA and NO cliffhanger.
author: Savannah Rylan
